ygData.subject: Re: Necro balancing (was negativity)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, why?  I thought they had pretty good arguments.  Their offensive skills were capped the same as hybrids, their defensive skills were capped the same
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 4 Feb 2000, JasonF wrote:
>
> PS: IMO, the ultimate whiny brat fiasco was Warriors getting critical hits
> and naturaly increasing MR a few months back.

Hmm, why? I thought they had pretty good arguments. Their
offensive skills were capped the same as hybrids, their
defensive skills were capped the same as hybrids, their extra
hp didn't matter because nearly all hybrids could buff/heal
themselves to more than compensate, and they were sitting
ducks against casters in PvP.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
